resources.string: The monument is located in the heart of Bishkek, on the Ala-Too Square. Its height together with the pedestal is 17 m, 55 cm. It is a bronze statue depicting a national hero riding a mighty horse. The author-sculptor is Bazarbay Sydykov, and the opening of the monument (August 31, 2011)

Monument to Ch. Aitmatov The height of the monument is about 8 m. The monument is dedicated to the 20th anniversary of the independence of Kyrgyzstan. Cast in Moscow on the money of public donations. Year of creation August 30, 2011 Author Sculptor: S. Beishenbayev.

"Supara Chunkurchak" is a successful reunion of two well-known brands. Another grandiose project of Tabylda Egemberdiev is located just 40 kilometers south of the capital in a beautiful place called the Chunkurchak tract. Supara Chunkurchak provides you with the conditions for a comfortable stay and an unforgettable rest and pastime. \n Work 24/7

One of the most popular and oldest places in the city is the Dzerzhinka district. The area is considered the most comfortable and prestigious for living. The locals were called the "golden youth". Now tourists are recommended to come here, and the place itself has changed its name to Erkindik Boulevard.

Kurmanzhan Mamatbai kyzy Monument Statesman and military leader, leader and ruler of the Alai Kyrgyz. She is also often called the "Alai Queen". She had the rank of "datka" (general) in the Kokand Khanate. Colonel of the Russian Imperial Army. Author Sculptor: V. A. Shestopalov.
